title: The owner / Architect shall mark individual trees, dense tree cover area / forest alike area
clause_text: The owner / Architect shall mark individual trees, dense tree cover area / forest alike area. However where the tree cluster is too dense for individual trees to be marked then the area covered by the tree cluster is to be clearly demarcated on the plans.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
